class.name: wxCheckBox
class.description: A checkbox is a labelled box which by default is either on (checkmark is visible) or off (no checkmark).

flag.name: wxCHK_2STATE
flag.description: Create a 2-state checkbox. This is the default.

flag.name: wxCHK_3STATE
flag.description: Create a 3-state checkbox. Not implemented in wxMGL, wxOS2 and wxGTK built against GTK+ 1.2.

flag.name: wxCHK_ALLOW_3RD_STATE_FOR_USER
flag.description: By default a user can't set a 3-state checkbox to the third state. It can only be done from code. Using this flags allows the user to set the checkbox to the third state by clicking.

flag.name: wxALIGN_RIGHT
flag.description: Makes the text appear on the left of the checkbox.

bool.name: checked
bool.label: Checked
bool.description: Should the checkbox be checked initially (default: 0)?

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKBOX_CLICKED
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_CHECKBOX_CLICKED event, when the checkbox is clicked.
